## Session.line\_items property

The array of line items purchased with this session. A session is guaranteed to contain either [Session.line\_items](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.line_items.md) or [Session.price](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.price.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly line_items?: LineItem[];
```
